name: Handcrafted Embroidered Silk Wall Art - Floral Design
description: The Handcrafted Embroidered Silk Wall Art - Floral Design by Heritage Embroidery is a stunning example of traditional textile arts. This exquisite wall art features a delicate floral design embroidered on high-quality silk fabric. The intricate stitching and vibrant colors bring the floral patterns to life, creating a beautiful and elegant piece for any room. Each piece is meticulously handcrafted by skilled artisans, making it a unique and collectible addition to your home decor. Perfect for adding a touch of sophistication and artistry to your living space or gallery.

name: Vintage Hand Embroidered Table Runner - Traditional Patterns
description: The Vintage Hand Embroidered Table Runner - Traditional Patterns by Timeless Textiles is a beautiful representation of classic embroidery techniques. This table runner features traditional patterns hand-embroidered on premium fabric, showcasing intricate details and vibrant colors. Ideal for adding a touch of vintage charm to your dining table or special occasions, this handcrafted piece offers a blend of cultural heritage and elegant design. Each runner is crafted by experienced artisans, ensuring quality and uniqueness in every piece.
